Selective Dissemination and Indexing of Scientific Information .A Schneider, John H. Automated methods for selective dissemination of information (SDI) to individual scientists and engineers play an important role in dealing with the increasing avalanche of scientific information.. This article presents some basic aspects of SDI systems and describes recent developments and problems..
